Title: Relates to the prohibition of the use of employment promissory notes and other similar provisions
Summary: Relates to the prohibition of the use of employment promissory notes and other similar provisions; defines transferable credential; relates to the effectiveness of such provisions.
LawCode: Amd §§1650, 1052 & 1053, Lab L; amd §3, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.4070-B & A.584-C)
